nodes.title: The CEO known for increasing his employees’ base annual pay to $70,000 says wealthy people donating and getting rewarded with “glowing articles, a hospital named after you and a massive tax write-off” amount to “one of capitalism’s biggest PR scams.” https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc
nodes.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 这位因将员工基本年薪提高到7万美元而闻名的CEO表示，富人捐款并获得 "光鲜亮丽的文章、以你名字命名的医院和大量的税收减免 "的奖励，相当于 "资本主义最大的公关骗局之一 "https://t.co/iEvy0Sv8Cc。

Dips last 6 minutes

Corrections last 6 days

回调持续6小时

nodes.title:
The S&P 500 has been within 5% of its all-time high for 4 straight months. 

To say that this pullback is normal and needed is an understatement. https://t.co/FQmVvxSHD8
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
S&P 500指数已经连续4个月距离历史高点5%以内。

说这种回调是正常的，是需要的，是轻描淡写的。https://t.co/FQmVvxSHD8。

S&P 500指數已經連續4個月距離歷史高點5%以內。

說這種回調是正常的，是需要的，是輕描淡寫的。https://t.co/FQmVvxSHD8。
